#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int npal (int n){
int rez=1;
int a=1;
while (n/a>0){
 if (rez!=1) rez=(rez*10)+(n/a%10);
  else rez=n/a%10;
 a*=10;

}
return rez;
}
int n,nzbir,t,i;
int main (){

 scanf("%d",&t);
 for (int testc=1;testc<=t;testc++){
  scanf("%d",&n);
  i=0;
  nzbir=0;
  while (true){
   i++;
   n=n+npal(n);
   if (n==npal(n)) {printf("%d %d\n",i,n); break;}
  }
 }
return 0;
}
